snippet: Sergey Brin of Google popped up in New York on Monday at Fashion Week. And so did Google Glass -- on the faces of Diane von Furstenberg and her models.
abstract: Sergey Brin of Google popped up in New York on Monday at Fashion Week. And so did Google Glass -- on the faces of Diane von Furstenberg and her models.

headline.main: On the Runway: Von Furstenberg Gives Google Glasses a Spin on the Runway
